Articles.Content:
...

The object to your right suddenly smells like bacon forever.

mmm delicous school uncomfortable headphones.

the object to your back(behind your chair) is now your new smellscreen monitor.

1 G3T TO SN1FF 4 D3SK. Y4Y >:]

The object that is closest to a metre away from you is now your only friend.

Oh classroom laptop docking station... We'll be friends forever...

The object underneath the nearest pencil to you turns into a parakeet.

Okay

-This message has been posted from parakeet. SQUAK!

The object of your choosing has remained perfectly unchanged, the same can't be said for everthing else though

I choose... Me! 

The object you're looking at suddenly explodes!

MY EYES! MY MONITOR IS IN MY EYES

The object you last touched before your mouse or keyboard becomes incredibly weak and will break irreparably the next time you touch it.

That would probably be the desk. I'll be careful.

The object to your upper left is your new best friend.

wheeeeeeeee! fluorescent tube lamp, you sure lighten up my day! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

the object nearest to you that is hanging from another object suddenly turns into an octopus.

well hi lampopus.

the object 5 yards to your left suddenly expoldes

There goes the office window....thanks a lot. Grrr......

The object 45 degrees left and 45 down turns into a liquid

A dirty 1' 1' tile lets go for a swim

the next soft thing you touch will kill you by ripping out your heart ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

NO!! HEADPHONE FLUFFY STUFFS!!!! WHY WOULD YOU DO THIS!?!?

The thing below you that isn't a chair or the ground is the only tool you can use to surgically put my hear back in.

China this should be interesting 

the object behind and above you by 8 meters you will marry

A ROCK ON THE ROOF!!! MY TRUE LOVE!

The object directly in front of you will give a BOSD

why pen. WHYU!

the object to the opposite of your computer's direction is the only floating object in a gravity filled void

um, why am I floating?

the object you last touched aside from anything related to the device you used to read this is your new power generator

My cat

the next thing you look at after looking at this page you will be forced to stab with a shotgun

a motivational/promotional poster at work.

With a grammatical error.

I am perfectly okay with stabbing, shooting, burning and utterly destroying this.

the next object you see resting on the floor is the missing piece to safe and easy nuclear fusion.

a newspaper... I FINNALY FOUND IT!

the next grammatical error you see will reach out and stab you in the back with the spy's butterfly knife

A Hardon Collider. Oh that may have been a typo.

The next kerbal you kill will suddenly appear and stab you with a rocket.

jeb stop. it's an srb?!? NOOOOOO!

the object to your left is now burning.

Oh jeez, my classmate is on fire...

The object to your right suddenly becomes radioactive!

my headphones are glowing...

the object to your back is now alive and vigorous! [Vigorous as in very wiggly]

A random women I can't complain 

the object to ect to your left is your toothbrush
